row.process:
@echo off
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Image" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_IMAGE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT('docker', ' &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service create ')
:IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_COMMAND#, "--name &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# ") :ENDIF
: SET &POS# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_COMMAND#, " &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION# ") : SET &POS#=STR_FIND("&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION#", "--detach=") : SET &POS1#=STR_FIND("&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION#", "-d=") : SET &POS# = &POS# + &POS1# :ENDIF
: IF &POS# = 0 : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_COMMAND#, ' --detach=false ') : ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_IMAGE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN :SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_COMMAND#, "&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# ")
!Get temporary File path :SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"&$RUNID#.txt")
! LOGGING COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CREATE SERVICE COMMAND: &UC4RB_COMMAND#"
! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ call &UC4RB_COMMAND# > "&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE#"
IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( @set retcode=%errorlevel% TYPE "&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE#" echo &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# DEL "&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE#" @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode )
SET ID= FOR /F "tokens=*" %%a in ('TYPE "&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE#"') do ( SET ID=%%a GOTO :Label ) :Label
IF "%ID%" EQU "" ( echo "Unable to retrieve service ID" echo &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# @set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
SET NAME= FOR /F "tokens=*" %%a in ('docker &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service inspect --format "{{.Spec.Name}}" "%ID%"') do SET NAME=%%a
IF "%NAME%" EQU "" ( echo "Unable to retrieve service Name" echo &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# @set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
echo UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID::=%ID% echo UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME::=%NAME%
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN

row.post_process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME# = "" :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID# = "&VALUE#" : ENDSWITCH
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID#,,"WORKFLOW"
